about_the_game:
Onion Book

This layered book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Like an onion, this book has layers! Each image is a part of a greater whole!

Color all the images to fully understand the setting of this book!

Contents

The Onion book unlocks the following images:
  • Alien Fauna - 25x27
  • Alien Flora - 25x28
  • Natives - 36x58
  • Gems - 47x67
  • AI Mech - 76x82
  • Astronaut - 77x105
  • Satellite - 90x120
  • Hand Drill - 93x42
  • Colonized - 100x100
  • Mech Invasion - 100x120
  • Acceleration - 110x110
  • Atmospheric Flight - 112x112
  • Rover Cockpit - 118x120
  • Deep Space - 120x90
  • Black Hole - 130x90
  • Lift Off - 130x130
  • Billboard - 150x138
  • There's Always a Bigger Fish - 198x57
  • Planetary Rover - 198x110
  • Left Behind - 200x120

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Onion Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
